author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

* follows up on https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/32651
* get rid of `getByLabel` calls
* convert to `global` plugins
* merge `EleIsoDetIdCollectionProducer` and `GamIsoDetIdCollectionProducer` to templated `EgammaIsoDetIdCollectionProducer`
* remove unused `EgammaElectronTkNumIsolationProducer`
* implement `fillDescriptions` in `ParticleBasedIsoProducer`

#### PR validation:

CMSSW compiles, local matrix tests pass.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No backport intended.
title: Some cleanup and modernization in EgammaIsolationAlgos plugins
